title: INtopBackup
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: How the turkey trotted its way onto our Thanksgiving tables — and into our lexicon

items.title: The origins of your dog's unique look may be older than you think
items.description: A new study finds that about half of the physical variation seen in modern dogs existed during the Stone Age.

items.title: The U.S. produces a lot of food waste. This place wants to address it
items.description: Even amid rising grocery prices and increased sensitivity to environmental issues, Americans still trash once-edible food at alarming rates.

items.title: Bolsonaro ordered to start serving 27-year prison sentence for Brazil coup plot
items.description: The Supreme Court says the former leader has exhausted his appeals and will start his prison term at a police station in Brasilia.

items.title: Mother jailed for "suitcase murders" of her children in New Zealand
items.description: The children's remains were discovered after their mother stopped paying rental fees for a storage unit in 2022.

items.title: At least four dead as fire engulfs Hong Kong tower blocks
items.description: Pictures show the flames spreading on bamboo scaffolding on the outside of the high-rise buildings in the Tai Po district.

items.title: Deadly fire engulfs Hong Kong apartment blocks
items.description: Video footage shows large plumes of smoke billowing up into the sky, as firefighters on cranes try and put out the blaze.

items.title: No real intent in Moscow to engage in peace talks, says von der Leyen
items.description: The European Commission chief said the EU would stand with Ukraine and support it "in every way".
